Text:
The URLs for the SoundSoap tutorials were stripped out of my description. Find them here:

h++p://www.bias-inc.com/downloads/videos/soundsoap2/movie.php

Sorry to say I lied. While the 96kHz/24bit sampling
will play in iTunes, it won't play on an iPod.  You
have to down-sample for iPod playback.

I am guessing 48kHz/16bit is the highest
sampling the iPod will handle, since those are
the max setting for AIFF encoding in iTunes, but
I haven't confirmed this.
